Arithmetic.description: Covers addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.

Power.description: Covers powers, which are repeated multiplication

Logarithm.description: Covers logarithms, which is an inverse for powers. This needs the 'Power' topic for completeness.

Trigonometry.description: Covers the core trigonometric functions: sine, cosine and tangent.

Differentiation.description: Covers the basics of differentiating functions

Play.description: Example of custom rules where the rules of algebra are not followed.

Rock, Paper, Scissors.description: Example of a function that is not associative, but commutative
